code: @Test public void testSendingMessage() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint result = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     result.expectedBodiesReceived(expectedBody).     template.sendBody("direct:start", orignalBody).     result.assertIsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:start").setBody(regexReplaceAll(body(), "Foo", "Bar")).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
